channel.title: Issues logging in
channel.description:
#### What happened?
Login error 4 and no connection to server after starting game
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
Should connect fine and I should be able to click login button
#### Steps to reproduce:
Start Throne of Lies
#### Comments:
I restart Throne of Lies 3-5 times - sometimes more - then eventually it works.

item.title: Issues logging in
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
When it doesn’t work again, please:

  1. Join our Discord @ https://discord.gg/tol
  2. Go to the #bugs channel and type ?logs to see where your logs are stored
  3. Drop your logs in #bugs along with an explanation of your issue.

Important: Please be sure NOT to restart until you get the logs or it’ll reset them~ With these logs, we can potentially see what happened and fix it, if it’s an issue on our end.

Read full topic
